turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like for you to pick up a coffee for me, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! Where would you like for me to pick up the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the Starbucks on Happy Avenue. The usually place is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, sure. What would you like to drink this morning?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A vanilla latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A tall, grande, or a venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A tall is enough. No heavy meetings today for a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pumps of syrups do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cut the sugar and only one pump is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want a substitute the milk for almond or soy milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm... Soy milk please. Thanks for asking.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream is needed. Or any other spices.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, just one order ma'am or will there be another order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one is enough. Unless, would you like a drink for yourself?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, but thank you very much. Should I charge this to your account?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be fine. Can you also pick up a slice of lemon pound cake for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! The total will be $5.75. Where should I meet you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be in building A, Room 408. Please come on in.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, I will be right there. Your order is all set.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! I really appreciate it.
